Package org.ivoa.dm.caom2.caom2.wcs

Class CoordFunction1D

java.lang.Object
org.ivoa.dm.caom2.caom2.wcs.CoordFunction1D
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.ivoa.vodml.jpa.JPAManipulations
@Embeddable @VoDml(id="caom2:caom2.wcs.CoordFunction1D", role=dataType) public class CoordFunction1D extends Object implements org.ivoa.vodml.jpa.JPAManipulations
a one-dimensional (linear) WCS coordinate transformation function. dataType: CoordFunction1D
